verbose_text: Second, PrP expression is upregulated in vitro by infection with adenovirus 5 [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], Epstein-Barr virus (EBV) [XREF_BIBR], hepatitis C virus [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], HIV-1 [XREF_BIBR], Helicobacter pylori [XREF_BIBR], and Mycobacterium bovis [XREF_BIBR], as well as by murine leukemia virus (MuLV) and vesicular stomatitis virus [XREF_BIBR].
